# The `VPWidenMemoryRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A common base class for widening memory operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPWidenMemoryRecipe</CodeBlock>

  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenloadevlrecipe">VPWidenLoadEVLRecipe</a></>}>
A recipe for widening load operations with vector-predication intrinsics, using the address to load from, the explicit vector length and an optional mask. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenloadevlrecipe/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenloadrecipe">VPWidenLoadRecipe</a></>}>
A recipe for widening load operations, using the address to load from and an optional mask. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenloadrecipe/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenstoreevlrecipe">VPWidenStoreEVLRecipe</a></>}>
A recipe for widening store operations with vector-predication intrinsics, using the value to store, the address to store to, the explicit vector length and an optional mask. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenstoreevlrecipe/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenstorerecipe">VPWidenStoreRecipe</a></>}>
A recipe for widening store operations, using the stored value, the address to store to and an optional mask. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vpwidenstorerecipe/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

A common base class for widening memory operations.

An optional mask can be provided as the last operand.

Definition at line 2953 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
